p: Chemicals including sodium hypochlorite (NaClO), Folin-Ciocalteu’s reagent, sodium carbonate (Na 2CO 3), aluminum chloride (AlCl 3), 2,2′-azinobis-(3-ethylbenzothiazoline-6-sulfonic acid) (ABTS), potassium persulfate (K 2S 2O 8), 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH), sodium acetate (CH 3COONa), β-carotene, chloroform, linoleic acid, tween 40, dipotassium phosphate (K 2HPO 4), monopotassium phosphate (KH 2PO 4), potassium ferricyanide (K 3[Fe(CN) 6]), trichloro acetic acid (CCl 3COOH), ferric chloride (FeCl 3), dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO), monosodium phosphate (NaH 2PO 4), sodium chloride (NaCl), hydrochloric acid (HCl) were obtained from Kanto Chemical Co., Inc., Tokyo, Japan. While tyrosinase, L-tyrosine, α-amylase, starch, iodine, 3-(4,5-dimethylthiazolyl)2,5-diphenyl-tetrazolium bromide (MTT), Iscove’s Modified Dulbecco’s Medium (IMDM), and cell lysis buffer were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA.
